parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

schema.description: Shared query filter parameter to configure carbon emissions data queries for all different report type defined in ReportTypeEnum.

reportType.description: The ReportType requested for carbon emissions data. Required. Specifies how data is aggregated and displayed in the output, as explained in the ReportTypeEnum.

values.name: OverallSummaryReport
values.description: Overall summary report provides total carbon emissions for the specified date range and query parameters, as well as comparative values for a high-level overview. This report type can accept different values in the start and end fields within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-03-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

values.name: MonthlySummaryReport
values.description: MonthlySummaryReport provides carbon emissions data by month for the specified query parameters. This report type can accept different values in the start and end fields within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-03-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

values.name: TopItemsSummaryReport
values.description: TopItemsSummaryReport provides the N highest-emitting items for the specified query filters. This report returns data for a single month at a time, so it requires the same values for the start and end fields within DateRange. A maximum of N=10 items can be returned at a time.

values.name: TopItemsMonthlySummaryReport
values.description: TopItemsMonthlyReport provides the N highest-emitting items by month for the specified query filter. Returns emissions data for the top N items by month within the given date range. A maximum of N=10 items can be returned at a time.

values.name: ItemDetailsReport
values.description: ItemDetailsReport provides a granular list of items based on the specified CategoryType (e.g., Resource, ResourceGroup, ResourceType, Location, or Subscription) for the query filter. This report can be queried for only one month at a time, requiring the same values in the start and end fields within DateRange.

dateRange.description: The start and end dates for carbon emissions data. Required. For ItemDetailsReport and TopItemsSummaryReport, only one month of data is supported at a time, so start and end dates should be equal within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-06-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

start.description: Start date parameter in yyyy-MM-01 format. Only the first day of each month is accepted.

end.description: End date parameter in yyyy-MM-01 format. Only the first day of each month is accepted.

subscriptionList.description: List of subscription IDs for which carbon emissions data is requested. Required. Each subscription ID should be in lowercase format. The max length of list is 100.

resourceGroupUrlList.description: List of resource group URLs for carbon emissions data. Optional. Each URL must follow the format '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourcegroups/{resourceGroup}', and should be in all lowercase.

resourceTypeList.description: List of resource types for carbon emissions data. Optional. Each resource type should be specified in lowercase, following the format 'microsoft.{service}/{resourceType}', e.g., 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts'.

locationList.description: List of locations(Azure Region Display Name) for carbon emissions data, with each location specified in lowercase (e.g., 'east us'). Optional. You can use the command 'az account list-locations -o table' to find Azure Region Display Names.

carbonScopeList.description: List of carbon emission scopes. Required. Accepts one or more values from EmissionScopeEnum (e.g., Scope1, Scope2, Scope3) in list form. The output will include the total emissions for the specified scopes.

items.description: Supported carbon emission scopes to be used with QueryParameter, as defined by the GHG Protocol. At least one scope must be specified. The output will return a total of all specified scopes.

values.name: Scope1
values.description: Scope1 carbon emission

values.name: Scope2
values.description: Scope2 carbon emission

values.name: Scope3
values.description: Scope3 carbon emission

value.description: The CarbonEmissionData items on this page

items.description: The basic response for different query report, all query report result will have these information

dataType.description: The data type of the query result, indicating the format of the returned response.

values.name: OverallSummaryData
values.description: The response data type for OverallSummaryReport

values.name: MonthlySummaryData
values.description: The response data type for MonthlySummaryReport

values.name: TopItemsSummaryData
values.description: The response data type for TopItemsSummaryReport

values.name: ResourceTopItemsSummaryData
values.description: The response data type for Resource's TopItemsSummaryReport

values.name: ResourceGroupTopItemsSummaryData
values.description: The response data type for ResourceGroup's TopItemsSummaryReport

values.name: TopItemsMonthlySummaryData
values.description: The response data type for TopItemsMonthlySummaryReport

values.name: ResourceTopItemsMonthlySummaryData
values.description: The response data type for Resource's TopItemsMonthlySummaryReport

values.name: ResourceGroupTopItemsMonthlySummaryData
values.description: The response data type for ResourceGroup's TopItemsMonthlySummaryReport

values.name: ItemDetailsData
values.description: The response data type for ItemDetailsReport

values.name: ResourceItemDetailsData
values.description: The response data type for Resource's ItemDetailsReport

values.name: ResourceGroupItemDetailsData
values.description: The response data type for ResourceGroup's ItemDetailsReport

latestMonthEmissions.description: Total carbon emissions for the specified query parameters, measured in kgCO2E. This value represents total emissions over the specified date range (e.g., March-June).

previousMonthEmissions.description: Total carbon emissions for the previous month’s date range, which is the same period as the specified date range but shifted left by one month (e.g., if the specified range is March - June, the previous month’s range will be Feb - May). The value is measured in kgCO2E.

monthOverMonthEmissionsChangeRatio.description: The percentage change in carbon emissions between the current and previous DateRange. This is calculated as: (latestMonthEmissions - previousMonthEmissions) / previousMonthEmissions.

monthlyEmissionsChangeValue.description: The change in carbon emissions between the current and previous period, calculated as: latestMonthEmissions - previousMonthEmissions.

skipToken.description: The pagination token to fetch next page data, it's null or empty if it doesn't have next page data

subscriptionAccessDecisionList.description: The access decision list for each input subscription

values.name: Allowed
values.description: Access allowed

values.name: Denied
values.description: Access denied

denialReason.description: The reason why access request got denied

get.description: List the operations for the provider

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

schema.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider

items.title: REST API Operation
items.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

CategoryTypeEnum.description: Supported category types to be used with QueryParameter. Each type represents a different level of emissions data aggregation.

values.name: Subscription
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the subscription level.

values.name: ResourceGroup
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource group level.

values.name: Location
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the location level.

values.name: Resource
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource level.

values.name: ResourceType
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource type level.

DateRange.description: Date range to be used with QueryParameter, it should be within 12 months between start and end date. In certain cases, start and end dates must be the same date.

start.description: Start date parameter in yyyy-MM-01 format. Only the first day of each month is accepted.

end.description: End date parameter in yyyy-MM-01 format. Only the first day of each month is accepted.

EmissionScopeEnum.description: Supported carbon emission scopes to be used with QueryParameter, as defined by the GHG Protocol. At least one scope must be specified. The output will return a total of all specified scopes.

values.name: Scope1
values.description: Scope1 carbon emission

values.name: Scope2
values.description: Scope2 carbon emission

values.name: Scope3
values.description: Scope3 carbon emission

categoryType.description: Specifies the category type for detailed emissions data, such as Resource, ResourceGroup, ResourceType, Location, or Subscription. See supported types in CategoryTypeEnum.

values.name: Subscription
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the subscription level.

values.name: ResourceGroup
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource group level.

values.name: Location
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the location level.

values.name: Resource
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource level.

values.name: ResourceType
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource type level.

orderBy.description: The column name to order the results by. See supported values in OrderByColumnEnum.

values.name: ItemName
values.description: The itemName filed in ItemDetailsReport result, see CarbonEmissionItemDetailData for more information.

values.name: LatestMonthEmissions
values.description: The latestMonthEmissions filed in ItemDetailsReport result, see CarbonEmissionItemDetailData for more information.

values.name: PreviousMonthEmissions
values.description: The previousMonthEmissions filed in ItemDetailsReport result, see CarbonEmissionItemDetailData for more information.

values.name: MonthOverMonthEmissionsChangeRatio
values.description: The monthOverMonthEmissionsChangeRatio filed in ItemDetailsReport result, see CarbonEmissionItemDetailData for more information.

values.name: MonthlyEmissionsChangeValue
values.description: The monthlyEmissionsChangeValue filed in ItemDetailsReport result, see CarbonEmissionItemDetailData for more information.

values.name: ResourceGroup
values.description: The resourceGroup filed in ResourceCarbonEmissionItemDetailData result, see ResourceCarbonEmissionItemDetailData for more information.

sortDirection.description: Direction for sorting results. See supported values in SortDirectionEnum.

values.name: Desc
values.description: Descending order for query result.

values.name: Asc
values.description: Ascending order for query result.

pageSize.description: Number of items to return in one request, max value is 5000.

skipToken.description: Pagination token for fetching the next page of data. This token is nullable and will be returned in the previous response if additional data pages are available.

allOf.description: Shared query filter parameter to configure carbon emissions data queries for all different report type defined in ReportTypeEnum.

reportType.description: The ReportType requested for carbon emissions data. Required. Specifies how data is aggregated and displayed in the output, as explained in the ReportTypeEnum.

values.name: OverallSummaryReport
values.description: Overall summary report provides total carbon emissions for the specified date range and query parameters, as well as comparative values for a high-level overview. This report type can accept different values in the start and end fields within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-03-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

values.name: MonthlySummaryReport
values.description: MonthlySummaryReport provides carbon emissions data by month for the specified query parameters. This report type can accept different values in the start and end fields within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-03-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

values.name: TopItemsSummaryReport
values.description: TopItemsSummaryReport provides the N highest-emitting items for the specified query filters. This report returns data for a single month at a time, so it requires the same values for the start and end fields within DateRange. A maximum of N=10 items can be returned at a time.

values.name: TopItemsMonthlySummaryReport
values.description: TopItemsMonthlyReport provides the N highest-emitting items by month for the specified query filter. Returns emissions data for the top N items by month within the given date range. A maximum of N=10 items can be returned at a time.

values.name: ItemDetailsReport
values.description: ItemDetailsReport provides a granular list of items based on the specified CategoryType (e.g., Resource, ResourceGroup, ResourceType, Location, or Subscription) for the query filter. This report can be queried for only one month at a time, requiring the same values in the start and end fields within DateRange.

dateRange.description: The start and end dates for carbon emissions data. Required. For ItemDetailsReport and TopItemsSummaryReport, only one month of data is supported at a time, so start and end dates should be equal within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-06-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

start.description: Start date parameter in yyyy-MM-01 format. Only the first day of each month is accepted.

end.description: End date parameter in yyyy-MM-01 format. Only the first day of each month is accepted.

subscriptionList.description: List of subscription IDs for which carbon emissions data is requested. Required. Each subscription ID should be in lowercase format. The max length of list is 100.

resourceGroupUrlList.description: List of resource group URLs for carbon emissions data. Optional. Each URL must follow the format '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourcegroups/{resourceGroup}', and should be in all lowercase.

resourceTypeList.description: List of resource types for carbon emissions data. Optional. Each resource type should be specified in lowercase, following the format 'microsoft.{service}/{resourceType}', e.g., 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts'.

locationList.description: List of locations(Azure Region Display Name) for carbon emissions data, with each location specified in lowercase (e.g., 'east us'). Optional. You can use the command 'az account list-locations -o table' to find Azure Region Display Names.

carbonScopeList.description: List of carbon emission scopes. Required. Accepts one or more values from EmissionScopeEnum (e.g., Scope1, Scope2, Scope3) in list form. The output will include the total emissions for the specified scopes.

items.description: Supported carbon emission scopes to be used with QueryParameter, as defined by the GHG Protocol. At least one scope must be specified. The output will return a total of all specified scopes.

values.name: Scope1
values.description: Scope1 carbon emission

values.name: Scope2
values.description: Scope2 carbon emission

values.name: Scope3
values.description: Scope3 carbon emission

MonthlySummaryReportQueryFilter.description: Query filter parameter to configure MonthlySummaryReport queries.

allOf.description: Shared query filter parameter to configure carbon emissions data queries for all different report type defined in ReportTypeEnum.

reportType.description: The ReportType requested for carbon emissions data. Required. Specifies how data is aggregated and displayed in the output, as explained in the ReportTypeEnum.

values.name: OverallSummaryReport
values.description: Overall summary report provides total carbon emissions for the specified date range and query parameters, as well as comparative values for a high-level overview. This report type can accept different values in the start and end fields within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-03-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

values.name: MonthlySummaryReport

values.name: ResourceGroup

ReportTypeEnum.description: Enum for Report Type, specifying different report formats for carbon emissions data. Each report type returns different aggregations of carbon emissions across various categories, date range, emissions scope, and other parameters.

values.name: OverallSummaryReport
values.description: Overall summary report provides total carbon emissions for the specified date range and query parameters, as well as comparative values for a high-level overview. This report type can accept different values in the start and end fields within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-03-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

values.name: Location
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the location level.

values.name: Resource
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource level.

values.name: ResourceType
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource type level.

resourceId.description: The fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

resourceType.description: The type of resource, for example: microsoft.storage/storageaccounts

allOf.description: The basic response for different query report, all query report result will have these information

dataType.description: The data type of the query result, indicating the format of the returned response.

values.description: The response data type for OverallSummaryReport

values.description: The response data type for TopItemsSummaryReport

values.description: The response data type for Resource's TopItemsSummaryReport

values.description: The response data type for Resource's TopItemsMonthlySummaryReport

values.name: ResourceItemDetailsData

values.name: ResourceGroupItemDetailsData

latestMonthEmissions.description: Total carbon emissions for the specified query parameters, measured in kgCO2E. This value represents total emissions over the specified date range (e.g., March-June).

previousMonthEmissions.description: Total carbon emissions for the previous month’s date range, which is the same period as the specified date range but shifted left by one month (e.g., if the specified range is March - June, the previous month’s range will be Feb - May). The value is measured in kgCO2E.

monthOverMonthEmissionsChangeRatio.description: The percentage change in carbon emissions between the current and previous DateRange. This is calculated as: (latestMonthEmissions - previousMonthEmissions) / previousMonthEmissions.

monthlyEmissionsChangeValue.description: The change in carbon emissions between the current and previous period, calculated as: latestMonthEmissions - previousMonthEmissions.

itemName.description: The resource name of resource for Resource Category

latestMonthEmissions.description: Total carbon emissions for the specified query parameters, measured in kgCO2E. This value represents total emissions over the specified date range (e.g., March-June).

previousMonthEmissions.description: Total carbon emissions for the previous month’s date range, which is the same period as the specified date range but shifted left by one month (e.g., if the specified range is March - June, the previous month’s range will be Feb - May). The value is measured in kgCO2E.

monthOverMonthEmissionsChangeRatio.description: The percentage change in carbon emissions between the current and previous DateRange. This is calculated as: (latestMonthEmissions - previousMonthEmissions) / previousMonthEmissions.

monthlyEmissionsChangeValue.description: The change in carbon emissions between the current and previous period, calculated as: latestMonthEmissions - previousMonthEmissions.

ResponseDataTypeEnum.description: The response data type of Carbon emission data

SortDirectionEnum.description: Sorting is supported for columns in ItemDetailsReport. This object define sorting direction.

values.name: Desc
values.description: Descending order for query result.

values.name: Asc
values.description: Ascending order for query result.

values.name: Allowed
values.description: Access allowed

values.name: Denied
values.description: Access denied

denialReason.description: The reason why access request got denied

TopItemsMonthlySummaryReportQueryFilter.description: Query filter parameter to configure TopItemsMonthlySummaryReport queries.

categoryType.description: Specifies the category type to retrieve top-emitting items, aggregated by month. See supported types in CategoryTypeEnum.

values.name: Subscription
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the subscription level.

values.name: ResourceGroup
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource group level.

values.name: Location
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the location level.

values.name: Resource
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource level.

values.name: ResourceType
values.description: Emissions aggregated at the resource type level.

topItems.description: The number of top items to return, based on emissions. Must be between 1 and 10.

allOf.description: Shared query filter parameter to configure carbon emissions data queries for all different report type defined in ReportTypeEnum.

reportType.description: The ReportType requested for carbon emissions data. Required. Specifies how data is aggregated and displayed in the output, as explained in the ReportTypeEnum.

values.name: OverallSummaryReport
values.description: Overall summary report provides total carbon emissions for the specified date range and query parameters, as well as comparative values for a high-level overview. This report type can accept different values in the start and end fields within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-03-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

values.name: MonthlySummaryReport
values.description: MonthlySummaryReport provides carbon emissions data by month for the specified query parameters. This report type can accept different values in the start and end fields within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-03-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

values.name: TopItemsSummaryReport
values.description: TopItemsSummaryReport provides the N highest-emitting items for the specified query filters. This report returns data for a single month at a time, so it requires the same values for the start and end fields within DateRange. A maximum of N=10 items can be returned at a time.

values.name: TopItemsMonthlySummaryReport
values.description: TopItemsMonthlyReport provides the N highest-emitting items by month for the specified query filter. Returns emissions data for the top N items by month within the given date range. A maximum of N=10 items can be returned at a time.

values.name: ItemDetailsReport
values.description: ItemDetailsReport provides a granular list of items based on the specified CategoryType (e.g., Resource, ResourceGroup, ResourceType, Location, or Subscription) for the query filter. This report can be queried for only one month at a time, requiring the same values in the start and end fields within DateRange.

dateRange.description: The start and end dates for carbon emissions data. Required. For ItemDetailsReport and TopItemsSummaryReport, only one month of data is supported at a time, so start and end dates should be equal within DateRange (e.g., start: 2024-06-01 and end: 2024-06-01).

start.description: Start date parameter in yyyy-MM-01 format. Only the first day of each month is accepted.

end.description: End date parameter in yyyy-MM-01 format. Only the first day of each month is accepted.

subscriptionList.description: List of subscription IDs for which carbon emissions data is requested. Required. Each subscription ID should be in lowercase format. The max length of list is 100.

resourceGroupUrlList.description: List of resource group URLs for carbon emissions data. Optional. Each URL must follow the format '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourcegroups/{resourceGroup}', and should be in all lowercase.

resourceTypeList.description: List of resource types for carbon emissions data. Optional. Each resource type should be specified in lowercase, following the format 'microsoft.{service}/{resourceType}', e.g., 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts'.

locationList.description: List of locations(Azure Region Display Name) for carbon emissions data, with each location specified in lowercase (e.g., 'east us'). Optional. You can use the command 'az account list-locations -o table' to find Azure Region Display Names.

carbonScopeList.description: List of carbon emission scopes. Required. Accepts one or more values from EmissionScopeEnum (e.g., Scope1, Scope2, Scope3) in list form. The output will include the total emissions for the specified scopes.

items.description: Supported carbon emission scopes to be used with QueryParameter, as defined by the GHG Protocol. At least one scope must be specified. The output will return a total of all specified scopes.

values.name: Scope1
values.description: Scope1 carbon emission

values.name: Scope2
values.description: Scope2 carbon emission

values.name: Scope3
values.description: Scope3 carbon emission

TopItemsSummaryReportQueryFilter.description: Query filter parameter to configure TopItemsSummaryReport queries.

categoryType.description: Specifies the category type for which to retrieve top-emitting items. See supported values defined in CategoryTypeEnum.
